abstract: Pinterest said it has crossed 100 million monthly active users. That exceeds user estimates for the online scrapbooking start-up, though it remains dwarfed by other digital contemporaries.

headline.main: Pinterest Crosses User Milestone of 100 Million

snippet: Pinterest said it has crossed 100 million monthly active users. That exceeds user estimates for the online scrapbooking start-up, though it remains dwarfed by other digital contemporaries.
